definition: any of various tailless stout-bodied amphibians with long hind limbs for leaping, hunt frogs for food
details:
noun
- any of various tailless stout-bodied amphibians with long hind limbs for leaping
= synonyms: toad, toad frog, anuran, batrachian, salientian
- a decorative loop of braid or cord
- a person of French descent
verb
- hunt frogs for food
